author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
The unpacker code for L1T GT/Calo/GMT unpackers are updated to set the product instance to the object type.

This allows downstream HLT code to use edm::View in order to access the four-vectors of L1T objects.

The L1T downstream code required updates to adapt to this change, which has been completed, for all but some test code in L1Trigger/L1TGlobal which can be adapted separately.
title: Update L1T GT/Calo/GMT unpackers to have non-null product instances
